ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The author acknowledges grant funding from NIH (R21 AI 129844) and the Gillson Longenbaugh Foundation.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: ADTB is support by grants from the NIH (R21 AI 129844) and the Gillson Longenbaugh Foundation. The funders did not contribute to the design of the study, to the collection, analysis, and interpretation of data, or to writing the manuscript.

sec.title: Authorâ€™s contributions
sec.p: ADTB wrote the manuscript. The author read and approved the final manuscript.
